upload.title: 你一定会喜欢的文件转换工具。
upload.subtitle: 所有图片、音频和文档处理都在你的设备上进行。视频通过超快速服务器转换。无文件大小限制，无广告，完全开源。

tooltip.partial_support: 此格式仅可作为{direction}进行转换。
tooltip.video_server_processing: 视频默认上传到服务器进行处理，点击这里了解如何在本地设置。

features.title: Convert PNG to JPG, WebP to JPG, MKV to MP4, WAV to MP3, and any other formats online for free
features.speed: File converter *** works faster than any alternative. Convert images, audio, documents, and videos to any format without delays.
features.local_processing_desc: Images, audio, and documents are converted directly in the browser. Files never leave your device. No delays sending and receiving data from a server. Complete privacy.
features.server_processing_desc: Videos are converted on servers. Upload your file and get results several times faster than competitors. All files are automatically deleted after one hour.
features.all_formats_desc: Convert PNG to JPG, WebP to PNG, MKV to MP4, AVI to MP4, WAV to MP3, DOCX to PDF, PDF to Word online. Support for more than 200 formats including images, audio, documents, and video.
features.no_restrictions_desc: No file size limits. No registration required. Simply upload a file and get results. Completely free online converter.

how_it_works.title: How Online File Conversion Works?
how_it_works.subtitle: Just 3 Simple Steps to Convert Any File

step1.title: Upload File
step1.description: Select an image, audio, document, or video from your device.

step2.title: Select Format
step2.description: Specify which format to convert to. Supports PNG, JPG, WebP, MP3, WAV, MP4, MKV, PDF, DOCX and 200+ other formats.

step3.title: Download Result
step3.description: Get your converted file in just seconds. Images and audio are processed instantly, videos are faster than any alternative.

try_now.title: Try It Right Now!
try_now.description: Upload a file and convert it in seconds. No registration, no limits. Works in all browsers on computer and phone.

zip_file.extracting: 检测到 ZIP 压缩包：{filename}
zip_file.extracted: 从 {filename} 中提取了 {extract_count} 个文件。{ignore_count} 个项目被忽略。

convert.large_file_warning: 由于浏览器/设备限制，此文件大于 {limit}GB，视频转音频功能已禁用。我们建议使用 Firefox 或 Safari 处理此大小的文件，因为它们的限制较少。

external_warning.title: 外部服务器警告
external_warning.text: 如果你选择转换为视频格式，这些文件将被上传到外部服务器进行转换。是否继续？

errors.vertd_server: 你在做什么...？你应该运行 vertd 服务器！
errors.vertd_generic_body: 尝试转换视频时发生错误。你想将此视频提交给开发者以帮助修复此错误吗？只会发送你的视频文件，不会上传任何标识符。
errors.vertd_failed_to_keep: 无法在服务器上保留视频：{error}
errors.vertd_details_body: 如果你按下提交，你的视频也会被附加在错误日志旁边，日志会自动报告给我们审核。以下信息是我们自动接收的日志：
errors.vertd_details_footer: 此信息仅用于故障排查，绝不会被共享。查看我们的[privacy_link]隐私政策[/privacy_link]了解更多详情。
errors.unsupported_format: 仅支持图片、视频、音频和文档文件
errors.format_output_only: 此格式目前只能用作输出（转换目标），不能用作输入。
errors.vertd_not_found: 未找到 vertd 实例来开始视频转换。请确保实例 URL 设置正确。
errors.worker_error: {type}转换器初始化时出错，请稍后重试。
errors.worker_timeout: {type}转换器初始化时间超出预期，请再等待一会儿或刷新页面。
errors.vertd_ratelimit: Your video, '{filename}', has failed to convert a few times. To prevent server overload, further conversion attempts for this file have been temporarily blocked. Please try again later.

appearance.title: 外观
appearance.brightness_description: 想要阳光明媚的闪光弹，还是宁静孤独的夜晚？
appearance.effect_description: 你想要华丽的效果，还是更静态的体验？

conversion.title: 转换
conversion.filename_description: 这将决定下载时的文件名，不包括文件扩展名。你可以在格式中使用以下模板，它们将被替换为相关信息：%name%表示原始文件名，%extension%表示原始文件扩展名，%date%表示文件转换时的日期字符串。
conversion.default_format_description: 这将更改上传此文件类型时自动选择的默认格式。
conversion.metadata_description: 这将更改转换后的文件是否保留原始文件的元数据（EXIF、歌曲信息等）。
conversion.quality_description: 更改输出文件的质量。值越高，处理时间和文件大小越大。
conversion.quality_video: 更改视频转换的质量。质量越高，转换时间和文件大小越大。

vertd.title: 视频转换
vertd.description: vertd项目是 FFmpeg 的服务器包装器。这允许你通过 VERT 网页界面方便地转换视频，同时仍能利用 GPU 的强大性能以尽可能快的速度完成转换。
vertd.hosting_info: 我们为你提供了一个公共实例以方便使用，但如果你知道如何操作，在自己的电脑或服务器上托管也很容易。你可以在[vertd_link]这里[/vertd_link]下载服务器二进制文件 - 设置过程将来会变得更简单，敬请期待！
vertd.speed_description: 这描述了速度和质量之间的权衡。速度越快质量越低，但完成工作的速度更快。

privacy.title: 隐私与数据
privacy.plausible_description: 我们使用[plausible_link]Plausible[/plausible_link]，一个注重隐私的分析工具，来收集完全匿名的统计数据。所有数据都是匿名和聚合的，不会发送或存储任何可识别信息。你可以在[analytics_link]这里[/analytics_link]查看分析数据，并在下方选择退出。
privacy.cache_description: 我们在浏览器中缓存转换器文件，这样你就不必每次都重新下载，从而提高性能并减少数据使用。
privacy.site_data_description: 清除所有网站数据，包括设置和缓存文件，将 VERT 重置为默认状态并重新加载页面。
privacy.clear_all_data_confirm: 这将重置所有设置和缓存，然后重新加载页面。此操作无法撤消。
privacy.all_data_cleared: 所有网站数据已清除！正在重新加载页面...
privacy.all_data_clear_error: 清除所有网站数据失败。

language.title: 语言
language.description: 选择 VERT 界面的首选语言。

why.title: 为什么选择 VERT？
why.description:
文件转换器一直让我们失望。它们很丑陋，充满广告，最重要的是；很慢。我们决定通过制作一个解决所有这些问题的替代方案，一劳永逸地解决这个问题。

所有非视频文件都完全在设备上转换；这意味着不需要在服务器之间发送和接收文件的延迟，而且我们永远不会窥探你转换的文件。

视频文件会上传到我们超快速的 RTX 4000 Ada 服务器。如果你不转换视频，它们会在服务器上保留一小时。如果你转换文件，视频将在服务器上保留一小时，或直到下载完成。然后文件将从我们的服务器中删除。

sponsors.title: 赞助商
sponsors.description: 想支持我们吗？请在[discord_link]Discord[/discord_link]服务器上联系开发者，或发送电子邮件至
sponsors.email_copied: 电子邮件已复制到剪贴板！

donate.title: 捐赠给 VERT
donate.description: 有了你的支持，我们可以继续维护和改进 VERT。
donate.donation_error: 处理捐赠时出错。请稍后重试。
donate.payment_error: 获取支付详情时出错。请稍后重试。
donate.donation_notice_official: Your donations here go to the official VERT instance (vert.sh), and helps to support the development of the project.
donate.donation_notice_unofficial: Your donations here go to the operator of this VERT instance. If you wish to support the official VERT developers, please visit [official_link]vert.sh[/official_link] instead.

credits.title: 致谢
credits.contact_team: 如果你想联系开发团队，请使用“资源”卡片上的电子邮件。
credits.notable_description: 我们要感谢这些人对 VERT 的重大贡献。
credits.github_description: 非常感谢所有这些人的帮助！[github_link]也想帮忙吗？[/github_link]
credits.no_contributors: 似乎还没有人贡献……[contribute_link]成为第一个贡献者！[/contribute_link]
credits.libraries_description: 非常感谢 FFmpeg（音频、视频）、ImageMagick（图片）和 Pandoc（文档）多年来维护如此出色的库。VERT 依赖它们为你提供转换服务。

roles.lead_developer: 首席开发者；转换后端、UI 实现
roles.designer: 设计师；用户体验、品牌、营销
roles.docker_ci: 维护 Docker 和 CI 支持
roles.former_cofounder: 前联合创始人和设计师

errors.github_contributors: 获取 GitHub 贡献者时出错

errors.magick: Magick worker 出错，图片转换可能无法正常工作。
errors.ffmpeg: 加载 ffmpeg 时出错，某些功能可能无法工作。
errors.pandoc: 加载 Pandoc worker 时出错，文档转换可能无法正常工作。
errors.file_too_large: 此文件超过 {limit}GB 浏览器/设备限制。请尝试使用 Firefox 或 Safari 转换此大文件，它们通常具有更高的限制。

summary.title: 摘要
summary.description:
VERT 的隐私政策非常简单：我们根本不收集或存储你的任何数据。我们不使用 cookie 或跟踪器，分析是完全私密的，所有转换（视频除外）都在你的浏览器本地进行。视频在下载后或一小时后删除，除非你明确授权存储；它只会用于故障排查。VERT 自托管 Coolify 实例用于托管网站和 vertd（用于视频转换），以及用于完全匿名和聚合分析的 Plausible 实例。

请注意，这可能仅适用于[vert_link]vert.sh[/vert_link]的官方 VERT 实例；第三方实例可能以不同方式处理你的数据。

conversions.title: 转换
conversions.description:
大多数转换（图片、文档、音频）完全在你的设备上本地使用相关工具的 WebAssembly 版本（例如 ImageMagick、Pandoc、FFmpeg）进行。这意味着你的文件永远不会离开你的设备，我们也永远无法访问它们。

视频转换在我们的服务器上进行，因为它们需要更多的处理能力，并且目前无法在浏览器上非常快速地完成。你使用 VERT 转换的视频在下载后或一小时后删除，除非你明确授权我们将它们存储更长时间，纯粹用于故障排查。

conversion_errors.title: 转换错误
conversion_errors.description: 当视频转换失败时，我们可能会收集一些匿名数据以帮助我们诊断问题。这些数据可能包括：
conversion_errors.list_job_id: 任务 ID，即匿名化的文件名
conversion_errors.list_stderr: 你任务的 FFmpeg stderr 输出（错误消息）
conversion_errors.list_video: 实际视频文件（如果明确授权）
conversion_errors.footer: 此信息仅用于诊断转换问题。只有在你明确授权的情况下，才会收集实际视频文件，并且仅用于故障排查。

analytics.title: 分析
analytics.description: 我们自托管 Plausible 实例用于完全匿名和聚合的分析。Plausible 不使用 cookie，并符合所有主要隐私法规（GDPR/CCPA/PECR）。你可以在[settings_link]设置[/settings_link]的“隐私与数据”部分选择退出分析，并在[plausible_link]这里[/plausible_link]阅读更多关于 Plausible 隐私实践的信息。

local_storage.title: 本地存储
local_storage.description:
我们使用浏览器的本地存储来保存你的设置，使用浏览器的会话存储来临时存储“关于”部分的 GitHub 贡献者列表，以减少重复的 GitHub API 请求。不会存储或传输任何个人数据。

我们使用的转换工具的 WebAssembly 版本（FFmpeg、ImageMagick、Pandoc）也会在你首次访问网站时本地存储在浏览器中，这样你就不需要每次访问时都重新下载它们。不会存储或传输任何个人数据。你可以随时在[settings_link]设置[/settings_link]的“隐私与数据”部分查看或删除这些数据。

contact.title: 联系
contact.description: 如有问题，请发送电子邮件至：[email_link]hello@vert.sh[/email_link]。如果你使用的是第三方 VERT 实例，请联系该实例的托管者。

donations.title: Donations
donations.description: We use Stripe on the [about_link]about[/about_link] page to collect donations. Stripe may collect certain information about the payment and device for fraud prevention as described in [stripe_link]their documentation on advanced fraud detection[/stripe_link]. External network requests to Stripe are deferred, and are only made after you click the button to pay.

conversion.title: {from} to {to} Converter - Fast & Free Online Tool
conversion.description: Convert {from} files to {to} format online. Fast, secure, and completely free file conversion using client-side processing. No file size limits.

intro.generic: Converting from {from} to {to} is a common requirement for many users. This conversion might be necessary for compatibility with specific software, reducing file size, improving quality, or meeting platform requirements. Our online converter makes this process simple and efficient.
intro.jpg_to_png: Converting JPG to PNG preserves image quality by using lossless compression, making it ideal for images requiring transparency or high fidelity.
intro.png_to_jpg: Converting PNG to JPEG significantly reduces file size using lossy compression, suitable for photographs and complex images.
intro.mp3_to_wav: Converting MP3 to WAV creates an uncompressed audio file, preserving audio quality but increasing file size significantly.
intro.wav_to_mp3: Converting WAV to MP3 reduces file size significantly using lossy compression, making files easier to store and share while maintaining good audio quality.
intro.mp4_to_avi: Converting MP4 to AVI changes the container format, which may be necessary for compatibility with older software or specific video editing tools.
intro.avi_to_mp4: Converting AVI to MP4 provides better compression and wider compatibility with modern devices and web platforms while preserving video quality.
intro.pdf_to_doc: Converting PDF to DOC allows for editable text content, making it possible to modify and update document content.
intro.doc_to_pdf: Converting DOC to PDF preserves document formatting across different devices and operating systems, making it ideal for distribution and printing.

reason.software_compatibility: Compatibility with software that only supports {format}
reason.compression: Different compression algorithms that may reduce file size
reason.quality: Different quality characteristics that may be preferable
reason.platform: Platform requirements (web, mobile, or desktop applications)

jpg_to_png.quality: To preserve image quality with lossless compression
jpg_to_png.text_art: For images with text or line art

png_to_jpg.web_use: For web use where smaller files are preferred
png_to_jpg.email: For email attachments with size limits

reason.archiving_audio: To preserve original quality for archiving
reason.professional_software: For use in professional audio software

wav_to_mp3.reduce_size: To reduce file size for storage or sharing
wav_to_mp3.quality_over_size: When file size is more important than quality

reason.compatibility_old_software: For compatibility with older video software
reason.better_compression: For better compression and smaller file sizes
reason.word_processing: For use in word processing software

tip.use_original: For best results, use original high-quality files when possible
tip.check_size: Check the file size limitations if converting large files

tip.jpg_quality_setting: Choose a high JPEG quality setting for better results

tip.quality_over_size: Use this format when quality is more important than file size
tip.other_lossless: Consider other lossless formats like {format} for better compression
tip.appropriate_bitrate: Choose an appropriate bitrate (192kbps or higher for good quality)
tip.specific_use_case: Consider your specific use case when selecting quality
tip.keep_original_wav: Keep original WAV files for archival purposes
tip.avi_larger_than_mp4: {format1} files may be larger than {format2} equivalents
tip.keep_mp4_web: Consider keeping MP4 for web streaming
tip.verify_quality_settings: Verify quality settings to preserve video quality
tip.h264_h265_best: Consider H.264 or H.265 for best results
tip.complex_layouts_not_perfect: Complex layouts may not convert perfectly
tip.text_extraction_alternative: For simple text, consider text extraction instead
tip.pdfs_not_editable: PDFs are not editable without specific software

quality_note.lossy_to_lossy: Converting from a lossy format to another lossy format may reduce quality
quality_note.backup: Always keep original files as backup
quality_note.png_lossless: PNG files are lossless and preserve all image data
quality_note.png_larger_files: File sizes will be larger than {format2} equivalents
quality_note.jpg_lossy: JPEG is lossy and will reduce image quality
quality_note.jpg_transparency_lost: Transparency will be lost in conversion
quality_note.jpg_repeat_degrade: Repeated conversions will further degrade quality
quality_note.mp3_to_wav_no_restore: Converting from MP3 to WAV does not restore lost quality
quality_note.mp3_artifacts_remain: Original MP3 compression artifacts will remain
quality_note.mp3_lossy: MP3 is lossy and will reduce audio quality
quality_note.mp3_no_restore: Once converted, lost quality cannot be restored
quality_note.mp3_preserve_info: Higher bitrates preserve more audio information
quality_note.quality_vary_codec: Quality may vary based on codec used
quality_note.mp4_compression_efficiency: MP4 typically provides better compression efficiency
quality_note.quality_maintained_settings: Quality can be maintained with appropriate settings
quality_note.h264_h265_best: H.264 or H.265 codecs provide the best results
quality_note.complex_formatting_lost: Complex formatting may be lost during conversion
quality_note.tables_layout_adjust: Tables and layouts may need adjustment
quality_note.file_size_varies: File size may be smaller or larger depending on content
quality_note.pdfs_more_secure: PDFs are more secure and harder to modify

is_free.question: Is it free?
is_free.answer: Yes. The converter is completely free. No paid subscriptions or hidden payments. All features are available without restrictions.

is_safe.question: Is it safe to upload files?
is_safe.answer: Yes. Images, audio, and documents are converted directly in the browser. They never leave your device. Videos are uploaded to the server but automatically deleted after one hour. We don't store or view your files.

formats_supported.question: What formats are supported?
formats_supported.answer: We support more than 200 formats. Images: PNG, JPG, WebP, HEIC, SVG, GIF, AVIF and others. Audio: MP3, WAV, FLAC, OGG, AAC, M4A and others. Video: MP4, MKV, AVI, MOV, WebM, FLV and others. Documents: PDF, DOCX, DOC, HTML, EPUB, ODT and others.

file_size_limit.question: Are there any file size limits?
file_size_limit.answer: No. You can upload files of any size. There are no limits for images, videos, or documents.

registration_required.question: Is registration required?
registration_required.answer: No. Simply open the website, upload a file, and convert. No email, no password, no personal data.

mobile_compatible.question: Does it work on phones?
mobile_compatible.answer: Yes. *** works in all browsers on phones and tablets. The interface is adapted for mobile devices.

why_video_server.question: Why are videos converted on the server?
why_video_server.answer: Video conversion requires a lot of resources. Your phone or computer might not handle it or will work slowly. Our servers convert videos several times faster. All files are deleted after an hour.

quality_loss.question: Is quality lost during conversion?
quality_loss.answer: Depends on the format. During PNG to JPG or WebP to JPG conversion, there might be slight compression. But you can manually adjust quality. Most conversions happen without quality loss.

supported_browsers.question: Which browsers are supported?
supported_browsers.answer: Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge, and other modern browsers. If the browser was released in the last 2-3 years, VERT will work.

batch_conversion.question: Can I convert multiple files at once?
batch_conversion.answer: Yes. Upload several files simultaneously. They will be processed one by one. You can download each file separately or all together as an archive.

metadata_preserved.question: Are file metadata preserved?
metadata_preserved.answer: Depends on the format. In most cases, basic metadata is preserved. If you want to remove metadata, you can use our cleaning tool before conversion.

why_faster.question: Why does *** work faster than other converters?
why_faster.answer: Images, audio, and documents are processed on your device. No server delays. Videos are converted on powerful servers that are 5-10 times faster than regular processors.

description.jpg: a lossy compressed image format ideal for photographs
description.png: a lossless compressed image format supporting transparency
description.gif: a format supporting animated images and simple graphics
description.mp3: a lossy compressed audio format with small file sizes
description.wav: an uncompressed audio format preserving all audio data
description.mp4: a compressed multimedia container format widely compatible
description.avi: a multimedia container format developed by Microsoft
description.pdf: a document format preserving layout across platforms
description.doc: a proprietary document format for Microsoft Word
description.docx: a modern XML-based document format for Microsoft Word

comparison.jpg_png: JPG uses lossy compression while PNG uses lossless compression
comparison.png_jpg: PNG preserves quality but creates larger files compared to JPG
comparison.mp3_wav: MP3 uses lossy compression while WAV is uncompressed
comparison.wav_mp3: WAV preserves all audio data while MP3 reduces file size
comparison.mp4_avi: MP4 offers better compression and cross-platform compatibility
comparison.avi_mp4: MP4 provides more efficient compression than AVI
comparison.pdf_doc: PDF preserves formatting while DOC allows editing
comparison.doc_pdf: DOC allows editing while PDF preserves formatting across platforms
comparison.default: The {from} format has different characteristics than {to}

quality_impact.jpg_to_png: Converting from JPG to PNG will not restore quality lost during the original JPG compression, but it will preserve the current quality using lossless compression.
quality_impact.png_to_jpg: Converting from PNG to JPG will reduce quality due to JPG's lossy compression algorithm. The extent of quality loss depends on the JPG quality setting used during conversion.
quality_impact.mp3_to_wav: Converting from MP3 to WAV will not restore audio quality that was lost during the original MP3 compression. WAV will preserve the current quality level but in an uncompressed format.
quality_impact.wav_to_mp3: Converting from WAV to MP3 will reduce audio quality due to MP3's lossy compression. However, using higher bitrates (192kbps or above) can maintain good audio quality.
quality_impact.mp4_to_avi: Converting from MP4 to AVI typically preserves video quality but may result in larger file sizes depending on the codec used.
quality_impact.avi_to_mp4: Converting from AVI to MP4 typically maintains video quality while reducing file size due to MP4's more efficient compression.
quality_impact.default: The impact on quality depends on the specific formats involved. Converting from a lossy format to another lossy format typically results in some quality loss, while converting to a lossless format preserves existing quality.
